sectionA.title: Zakatable Assets
sectionA.tradeGoodsNote: Include market value of property/apartments bought for RESALE. Property for personal use or renting is NOT zakatable.
sectionA.receivableDebtsNote: Only debts likely to be recovered.
sectionA.foreignCurrencyNote: Add each foreign currency account separately (Wise, Payoneer, crypto wallets, etc.). Enter amount in original currency and the exchange rate to your primary currency.
sectionA.sharesForDividendsNote: Non-zakatable assets value can be subtracted.

sectionB.title: Deductions
sectionB.installmentsDueNote: Enter only installments CURRENTLY DUE (e.g., this quarter's apartment installment). Future installments not yet due are generally NOT deductible.

nisab.title: Nisab
nisab.description: Zakat is only obligatory when net wealth exceeds Nisab

result.title: Zakat Calculation
result.enterNisabReason: Enter gold or silver price per tola

quote1.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنفِقُوا مِن طَيِّبَاتِ مَا كَسَبْتُمْ وَمِمَّا أَخْرَجْنَا لَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ
quote1.translation: O you who believe! Spend of the good things which you have earned, and of that which We have produced from the earth for you.

quote2.arabic: خُذْ مِنْ أَمْوَالِهِمْ صَدَقَةً تُطَهِّرُهُمْ وَتُزَكِّيهِم بِهَا
quote2.translation: Take from their wealth a charity by which you purify them and cause them increase.

quote3.arabic: مَّثَلُ الَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ حَبَّةٍ أَنبَتَتْ سَبْعَ سَنَابِلَ فِي كُلِّ سُنبُلَةٍ مِّائَةُ حَبَّةٍ
quote3.translation: The example of those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah is like a seed that sprouts seven ears; in each ear is a hundred grains.

quote4.arabic: بُنِيَ الْإِسْلَامُ عَلَى خَمْسٍ: شَهَادَةِ أَنْ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا رَسُولُ اللَّهِ، وَإِقَامِ الصَّلَاةِ، وَإِيتَاءِ الزَّكَاةِ
quote4.translation: Islam is built upon five pillars: the testimony that there is no god but Allah and Muhammad is His Messenger, establishing prayer, and giving Zakat...

quote5.translation: Protect your wealth by giving Zakat.

common.disclaimer: For self-assessment only. Consult a scholar for specific rulings.
